intro: Sarcoglottis pseudovillosa, commonly known as the hairy sarcoglottis, is a climbing herbaceous plant native to tropical regions of Central and South America. Sarcoglottis pseudovillosa is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and undergrowth. It is valued in traditional medicine for its purported medicinal properties.
